valueProps.text: AI-powered Corporate Tax software for UAE businesses
Avoid penalties with timely document expiry reminders

pains: Hefty penalties for late document updates

facts.text: Tax Star offers corporate tax, e-invoicing, and zakat automation solutions.
facts.evidence: Tax Star | Corporate Tax, E-Invoicing & Zakat Automation

facts.text: Tax Star's primary call to action is 'Book a Demo'.
The website includes sections for different roles and use cases.
Tax Star provides AI-powered Corporate Tax software for UAE businesses.
facts.evidence: At its core is our AI-powered Corporate Tax software for UAE businesses.

facts.text: The website has a section dedicated to compliance solutions.
Tax Star offers tools for corporate tax calculations, internal and client approvals, financial statements, and practice management.

facts.text: Tax Star provides E-invoicing solutions for the UAE.

The website provides resources such as video tutorials, podcasts, webinars, and blogs.
Tax Star's AI-powered tax software includes automated returns and smart reminders.
facts.evidence: Automated returns, IFRS financial statement, and smart reminders with Tax Star.

facts.text: Tax Star's E-Invoicing keeps invoices FTA-compliant.
facts.evidence: E-Invoicing that keeps your invoices FTA-compliant

facts.text: Tax Star's Zakat calculations are designed for KSA compliance.
Tax Star's AI-powered Corporate Tax Calculator ensures timely and accurate tax returns.

facts.text: Tax Star eliminates the need for word and excel in financial statement production.
facts.evidence: Eliminate word and excel and reduce errors.

facts.text: Companies are required to prepare financial statements as per corporate tax law.
facts.evidence: As per Corp tax law, all companies are required to prepare Financial Statements

facts.text: Failure to update registration documents within 20 days of expiry results in AED 5,000 penalty.
facts.evidence: Failure to update your registration documents within 20 days of expiry will result in hefty penalties.

facts.text: Tax Star provides timely notifications for document expiry.
facts.evidence: Tax Star notifies you when they are due on a timely basis.

facts.text: Tax Star's clients include Alpha Pro Partners and JRBCA.
